title: CREATE CATALOG INTEGRATION | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Creates a new catalog integration for Apache Iceberg™ tables
in the account or replaces an existing catalog integration.

The syntax of the command depends on the type of external Iceberg catalog that you use. The following topics explain the syntax for
creating catalog integrations for different use cases:

In addition to SQL, you can also use other interfaces, such as Snowflake REST APIs, Snowflake Python APIs, and Snowflake CLI.
See Alternate interfaces.
ALTER CATALOG INTEGRATION , DROP CATALOG INTEGRATION , SHOW CATALOG INTEGRATIONS, DESCRIBE CATALOG INTEGRATION
